register.description: This register contains the Addressing control bit
This register contains the address to write to or read from.
This register is used to write data to the TA location or read it back from the TA location.

bitfield.description: This register is used to read or write data

register.description: This register is used to transfer data when doing banked data operations.

register.description: Reading this register returns the AHB ROM Address.

bitfield.description: Reading this register returns the ROM Address

register.description: Reading this register returns the ID information for this AP.
